title: Keir Starmer – 2022 Comments on Downing Street Apology to the Monarch
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 14 January 2022.
content:
This shows just how seriously Boris Johnson has degraded the office of Prime Minister.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector

The Conservatives have let Britain down. An apology isn’t the only thing the Prime Minister should be offering the Palace today.
